vote.title: Authorize (1) a conditional grant agreement with Dallas City Homes, Inc. and/or its affiliates for the purchase and installation of solar panels for the multifamily development to be located at 3115 Topeka Avenue, Dallas, Texas 75212 in the amount of $300,000.00; and (2) a HOME Investment Partnership loan agreement in an amount not to exceed $2,085,504.00 for the construction of affordable housing for the new Construction and Substantial Rehabilitation Program - Not to exceed $2,385,504.00 - Financing: HOME Investment Partnerships Grant Fund ($2,085,504.00) and General Fund ($300,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize (1) a conditional grant agreement with Dallas City Homes, Inc. and/or its affiliates for the purchase and installation of solar panels for the multifamily development to be located at 3115 Topeka Avenue, Dallas, Texas 75212 in the amount of $300,000.00; and (2) a HOME Investment Partnership loan agreement in an amount not to exceed $2,085,504.00 for the construction of affordable housing for the new Construction and Substantial Rehabilitation Program - Not to exceed $2,385,504.00 - Financing: HOME Investment Partnerships Grant Fund ($2,085,504.00) and General Fund ($300,000.00)
